root['Desc'].new_value: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by [12|20]%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases DMG dealt by the wearer's Skill and Ultimate by [60|100]%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After the wearer uses their Ultimate, if this Ultimate consumes 140 or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point.
root['Desc'].old_value: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by [12|20]%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases DMG dealt by the wearer's Skill and Ultimate by [48|96]%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After the wearer uses their Ultimate, if this Ultimate consumes 140 or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger a maximum of 1 time every 2 turn(s).
